This story gives "long-term lease" a whole new meaning.

In San Francisco, a home has been listed on the market for under $500,000, which would seem like a steal, especially considering adjacent homes are nearly $2 and $3 million. But just because San Francisco is one of the most expensive places to live, that does not mean other people don’t have rights to your property.

I know none of that made sense but nothing makes sense in San Francisco.

A home was listed on the market for $488,000, even though it's worth $1.5 million. It was lis
title: Watch: Million-dollar San Francisco home hits the market for under $500K, but there's a catch

Progressives are not really what you would call “smart.” They are objectively naive people. But even before written language was a thing, people knew what a “woman” was. However, one should never underestimate the ability of progressives to complicate the simplest concept known to mankind.

Roses are red, violets are blue, and “a woman is a person who says she is.”

Don’t laugh at me, this is what Maya Wiley, President and CEO of the Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights said when testifying in front of a congressional committee. Oh, an
title: Watch: Woman Testifying Before Congress Gives The Most Pathetic Attempt To Define Woman Yet
